title: British police find 39 people dead in truck container
text:
London | British police have arrested a man on suspicion of murder after the bodies of 39 people were found in a truck container at an industrial estate east of London.

The victims, found at the Waterglade Industrial Park in Grays, Essex, on Wednesday included one teenager, police say.

A 25-year-old man from Northern Ireland has been arrested on suspicion of murder.

The industrial park in Grays, Essex. Fairfax

Early indications suggest there 38 are adults and one teenager, police say.

The lorry is from Bulgaria and entered the country at Holyhead, North Wales, one of the main port for ferries from Ireland.
description: A man has been arrested after the bodies of 39 people, including one teenager, were found inside a container truck east of London.
